description.narrative: National capacity is strengthened in legislation, planning and budgeting for equitable access to essential high impact maternal and child health interventions using REDS Strategy, by end 2016

mailing-address.narrative: UN Street 12 Sukhbaatar District 1st khoroo Ulaanbaatar - 14201

sector.narrative: HSS - Health sector policy, planning and governance at national or sub-national levels
Maternal and newborn care policy advocacy, evidence generation, national / subnational capacity development
Public health emergencies, including disease outbreaks

title.narrative: Mongolia United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
Mongolia 2019 Annual Report on Results for Children
Mongolia Country Office 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: National capacity is strengthened in legislation, planning and budgeting for equitable access to essential high impact maternal and child health interventions using REDS Strategy, by end 2016

description.narrative: While coverage of health and nutrition services increased in key geographic areas, at central level national guidelines on Community Integrated Management of Childhood Illnesses were adopted by the Ministry of Health, and the vaccine hesitancy survey and draft MCH Law were successfully completed, addressing key supply and demand bottlenecks. | Status:Met | As-of Date:12/01/2017

title.narrative: Percentage of health facilities in focus areas received and utilized local budget for implementation of Reaching Every District Strategy
A comprehensive RMNCAH communication plan (incorporating malaria, pneumonia and diarrhoea, PMTCT, immunisation, polio and child development) is developed, budgeted and implemented
National C4D strategy developed and implemented in focus areas
National EENC plan developed with cost and implemented in selected areas
National Law on MNCH is drafted and budgeted
UNICEF-targeted children 6 months to 15 years in humanitarian situations who are vaccinated against measles
(NOT VALID after Dec 31 2017) ) IPV introduced into routine immunization schedules and country switched from trivalent Oral Polio Vaccine (tOPV) to bivalent Oral Polio Vaccine (bOPV)
